message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first.  Given its value, I think a price of $11,500 is very fair. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Given my budget, $11,000 is the highest I can go right now.  Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,250?
